body_html:
OK, this might be a little harder to fix then I thought then.

I'd argue that dtypes shouldn't be coercible into integers, but this won't be an easy thing to fix from a backwards compatibility perspective.

body:
OK, this might be a little harder to fix then I thought then.

I'd argue that dtypes shouldn't be coercible into integers, but this won't be an easy thing to fix from a backwards compatibility perspective.
